title: Why VScouter?
text: VScouter is designed for FRC teams who want reliable, fast, and insightful scouting tools. Whether you're in the pits or the stands, VScouter helps your team make data-driven decisions without hassle.

section.title: Offline Scouting
section.content: VScouter runs entirely offline with auto-saving to USB drivesâ€”perfect for competitions with unreliable Wi-Fi.

section.title: Fast & Intuitive Forms
section.content: Enter match data in seconds with clean, intuitive pages designed for speed under pressure.

section.title: Runs on Any Device
section.content: VScouter works on any device with a web browser, including phones, tablets, and laptops.

section.title: Prebuilt and Customizable Analytics
section.content: VScouter comes with prebuilt analytics and allows you to create custom reports to fit your team's needs.
